analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x278ae6f52ce72b0df6cba451534b87846acc9d65.sol:
	Contract BPER has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x278ae6f52ce72b0df6cba451534b87846acc9d65.sol#205-206)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_contracts/0x278ae6f52ce72b0df6cba451534b87846acc9d65.sol#75-76) is not in mixedCase
